title: how people see Cassiopeia
body:
why does riot let this be a thing? is it really that hard to  make a pure Poison mage? 
all they have to do is shift the power away from her twin fangs and send it to her Damage over time & damage per second spells....
also while im at it fix how she looks in the splash please i miss the old splash

replies.body:
cassio cant be 100% poison, and not 100% twin fang ( like now ) ; 
cassio needs to be  50% DOT 50 % twin fang  . cassio cant be a pure poison mage , even before her rework her twin fang was a big part of her dps / identity .

One of those pictures I made lol.

But yeah I would probably main Cassiopeia if she was a Poison Mage. The closest things to that I guess are Singed, Teemo, and Twitch. None of which are Mages and  2/3 of them need a full gameplay rework anyways. Right now Cass is just a machine gun.
which picture? found this on the internet
The machine gun one. I post it on most Cass threads.
that was pretty cool you got a ryz version?
oh yah so you are the one i got this from i saw it in a comment XD

he scales off mana of course you buy mana any way so then its not much a problem late game and he still has that perma root
Well then you have Malzahar and Swain, which are dot mages even if it's not technically poison
Time is money, riot is not gonna be spending more time on Cass if she is considered viable even if she is not that viable. Cass is not popular and won't ever be and hence, not a priority.
